author: Kevin Carmichael
title: Bank of Canada unleashes billions to aid economy in what will likely be most severe recession this country has ever seen
description: Central bank holds rate and will start buying up to $50 billion in provincial debt, and up to $10 billion of corporate bonds
content:
The Bank of Canada has returned to the barricades with a satchel of new weapons to fight the economic fallout from COVID-19.
Policymakers left the benchmark lending rate unchanged at 0.25 per cent, but unveiled new programs that will see the central bank pur… [+5675 chars]
